verses.verse: <WG2532> When<WG3753> he opened<WG455> the seventh<WG1442> seal,<WG4973> there was<WG1096> silence<WG4602> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> for about<WG5613> half an hour.<WG2256>
<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> the seven<WG2033> angels<WG32> who<WG3739> stand<WG2476> before<WG1799> God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> seven<WG2033> trumpets<WG4536> were given<WG1325> to them.<WG846>

<WG2532> Another<WG243> angel<WG32> came<WG2064> and<WG2532> stood<WG2476> over<WG1909> the altar,<WG2379> having<WG2192> a golden<WG5552> censer.<WG3031> <WG2532> Much<WG4183> incense<WG2368> was given<WG1325> to him,<WG846> that<WG2443> he should add<WG1325> it to the prayers<WG4335> of all<WG3956> the saints<WG40> on<WG1909> the golden<WG5552> altar<WG2379> which was<WG3588> before<WG1799> the throne.<WG2362>
<WG2532> The smoke<WG2586> of the incense,<WG2368> with the prayers<WG4335> of the saints,<WG40> went up<WG305> before<WG1799> God<WG2316> out<WG1537> of the angel<WG32>'s hand.<WG5495>

<WG2532> The angel<WG32> took<WG2983> the censer,<WG3031> and<WG2532> he filled<WG1072> it<WG846> with the fire<WG4442> of<WG1537> the altar,<WG2379> and<WG2532> threw<WG906> it on<WG1519> the earth.<WG1093> <WG2532> There followed<WG1096> thunders,<WG1027> <WG2532> sounds,<WG5456> <WG2532> lightnings,<WG796> and<WG2532> an earthquake.<WG4578>
<WG2532> The seven<WG2033> angels<WG32> who had<WG2192> the seven<WG2033> trumpets<WG4536> prepared<WG2090> themselves<WG1438> to<WG2443> sound.<WG4537>

The<WG2532> first<WG4413> <WG32> sounded,<WG4537> and<WG2532> there followed<WG1096> hail<WG5464> and<WG2532> fire,<WG4442> mixed<WG3396> with blood,<WG129> and<WG2532> they were thrown<WG906> to<WG1519> the earth.<WG1093> <WG2532> One third of the earth was burnt up,<WG5154> and one third of the trees<WG1186> were burnt up,<WG2618> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> green<WG5515> grass<WG5528> was burnt up.<WG2618>

The<WG2532> second<WG1208> angel<WG32> sounded,<WG4537> and<WG2532> something<WG5613> like a great<WG3173> burning<WG2545> <WG4442> mountain<WG3735> was thrown<WG906> into<WG1519> the sea.<WG2281> <WG2532> One third<WG5154> of the sea<WG2281> became<WG1096> blood,<WG129>

and<WG2532> one third<WG5154> of the<WG2192> living<WG2192> creatures<WG2938> which were<WG3588> in<WG1722> the sea<WG2281> died.<WG599> <WG2532> One third<WG5154> of the ships<WG4143> were destroyed.<WG1311>

<WG2532> The third<WG5154> angel<WG32> sounded,<WG4537> and<WG2532> a great<WG3173> star<WG792> fell<WG4098> from<WG1537> the sky,<WG3772> burning<WG2545> like<WG5613> a torch,<WG2985> and<WG2532> it fell<WG4098> on<WG1909> one third<WG5154> of the rivers,<WG4215> and<WG2532> on<WG1909> the springs<WG4077> of the waters.<WG5204>

<WG2532> The name<WG3686> of the star<WG792> is called<WG3004> "Wormwood.<WG894>" <WG2532> One third<WG5154> of the waters<WG5204> became<WG1096> <WG1519> wormwood.<WG894> <WG2532> Many<WG4183> people<WG444> died<WG599> from<WG1537> the waters,<WG5204> because<WG3754> they were made bitter.<WG4087>

<WG2532> The fourth<WG5067> angel<WG32> sounded,<WG4537> and<WG2532> one third<WG5154> of the sun<WG2246> was struck,<WG4141> and<WG2532> one third<WG5154> of the moon,<WG4582> and<WG2532> one third<WG5154> of the stars;<WG792> so that<WG2443> one third<WG5154> of them<WG846> would be darkened,<WG4654> and<WG2532> the day<WG2250> wouldn't<WG3361> shine<WG5316> for one third<WG5154> of it,<WG846> and<WG2532> the night<WG3571> in the same way.<WG3668>

<WG2532> I saw,<WG1492> and<WG2532> I heard<WG191> an<WG1520> eagle,<WG32> flying<WG4072> in<WG1722> mid heaven,<WG3321> saying<WG3004> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> "Woe!<WG3759> Woe!<WG3759> Woe<WG3759> for those who dwell<WG2730> on<WG1909> the earth,<WG1093> because<WG1537> of the other<WG3062> voices<WG5456> of the trumpets<WG4536> of the three<WG5140> angels,<WG32> who<WG3588> are yet<WG3195> to sound!<WG4537>"
